column5: It looks like the CRA phone scam is making the rounds again...some  told me if I did not pay my outstanding balance immediately an arrest warrant would be issued...my response would not be allowed here!!!  Would love to know these low life's get your name and cell number....
The government recently released up till now, unpublished cell numbers. Expect telemarketers to be calling you cell form now on. Probably best to assign your cell number to the no call list. HH
